title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping        NPS Photo/Trash Trackers   Â    Dining "al fresco" on a boat on Lake Powell is the best way to enjoy your evening, especially when you've worked up an appetite after a day of volunteering. Not everyone has access to a boat upon which they can dine. Here are some options for eating and sleeping in Glen Canyon National Recreation Area:      Lodging Camping Restaurants
